description: Installation of new secure entrances to three pyramid blocks, incorporating a new concierge office at Noll House,  refurbishment of Central Square  with new paving and street furniture,  Installation of door entry system to all flats.  4 CCTV  cameras, new  enclosure  to cr√®che, erection of new electrical sub-station and installation of new ramp from Sonderburg Road.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: A landscaping schedule and plan detailing the type, size and species of at least 23 new trees which are to be planted within the area of the Andover Estate as a whole (in replacement of the existing 12 trees  to be removed as part of this application), shall be submitted and approved in writing  by the Local Planning Authority and these approved details shall be implemented within the first planting season following completion of the building works .

REASON: To ensure that a satisfactory standard a visual amenity is provided and maintained.
